text: I'm sorry that Veronika had to file for divorce! It was necessary. She deserves SO much better! That whore her husband ran with is INTENTIONALLY breaking up that marriage-merely a "GOLD-DIGGER WHORE"! Hey! She'll lose him like she got him! Hope Veronika takes his UGLY ASS to the BANK!( but 5 grand a MONTH on CLOTHES? HELL! I dont spend 5 grand in 5 YEARS)!😄 KATIE-PUT WALTER FIRST NOW OR HE WILL LEAVE YOU! SHAWNA & LORENZO-HE'S RUNNIN SCARED! Except for maybe his 1st wife- YOU are the ONLY one who's SACRIFICED & DIDNT marry him for $$$, Fame&Fortune! His looks are GONE NOW! Hes a VERY SELFISH MAN! Go live YOUR dream-NO matter WHERE it takes you, if NOT-you can STILL do it on your OWN & will meet another man who WONT be selfish.FUCK LORENZO LLAMAS! Hes the EPITOME of a NARCISSIST! As for SHIVA & MOHAMMED? HEY! He's STILL CUTE for 67! LOVE him-remember him from RHOBH.I actually BELIEVE that this girl TRULY LOVES him & USUALLY, when I see a WAY young girl with an older man, I ALWAYS think its for $$. I TRULY DONT BELIEVE this here.I TRULY believe its TRUE LOVE!Hope he will marry her.Just get a "pre-nup" if THATS all his concern is.If she TRULY loves him-( I believe that she DOES) she will sign it! Good luck! Im actually GLAD IM not ANY of you! Too much of a hassle!😄and P.S.VERONIKA! YOU MADE HIM-NOW GO & BREAK HIS FUGLY FAT ASS! YOU are WAY BETTER than he EVER WAS! You CAN do it! I realize its very difficult, dont know if I could do it, just some encouragement here.Prayers for you.P.S.When someone sends an RSVP, its because the affair was CATERED & PAID FOR! The LEAST one can do is REPLY! WHO in hell does this Bitch think she Is?! The QUEEN? VERY INSULTING, DISRESPECTFUL, CLASSLESS, & FUCKED-UP!! O.K IM DONE! HOPING for Season 2!
title: Amazon.com: Watch Second Wives Club, Season 1

meta_data.description: In Hollywood, second wives are often painted as opportunistic women who swoop in to take advantage of everything their successful husbands have to offer. These ladies may indulge in mermaid pool parties, live in multi-million dollar homes and have luxury cars with champagne refrigerators, but that doesn’t mean they don’t have to navigate the complications that come with having stepchildren, managi
